mapper.select: SELECT ACT_ID, ADMIN_ID, ACT_TITLE, ACT_ADDRESS, ACT_DATE, ACT_END, ACT_CUR, ACT_MAX FROM ACTIVITIES ORDER BY ACT_ID DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ACTIVITIES ( ACT_ID, ADMIN_ID, ACT_TITLE, ACT_ADDRESS, ACT_DATE, ACT_END, ACT_MAX, ACT_CUR, ACT_LAT, ACT_LON, ACT_LOAD, ACT_MONEY ) VALUES ( SEQ_ACTIVITIES.NEXTVAL, #{adminId}, #{actTitle}, #{actAddress}, #{actDate}, #{actEnd}, #{actMax}, 0, -- 현재 인원은 처음엔 0명 #{actLat}, #{actLon}, SYSDATE, -- 등록일은 현재 시간 #{actMoney} )
